name: Football Superstar 2
description:
Welcome footy fans! Lazy Boy Developments is proud to present the sequel to Football Superstar!

Start the game as an 16 year old with bags of potential and play until you retire. What happens in-between is up to you!

IMPROVE YOUR ABILITIES
Gain experience to upgrade your character abilities making you a better player. Perhaps you focus on speed, dribbling and crossing to become a world class winger or maybe you target strength, tackling and heading to become a defensive powerhouse? It’s up to you...

BECOME A LEGEND
Work you way up to the best leagues in the world. Play in domestic and European competitions and even play for your country! Can you win the World Cup?

MANAGE RELATIONSHIPS
Build and manage relationships throughout your career. Build a rapport with your teammates and manager, look after your parents, perhaps get married and even have a kid!

CONTROL YOUR DESTINY
Throughout your career various decisions and events will mould you as a person. Do you chase the money or focus on becoming the best you can be? How do you handle fame and fortune? And then there's the media, fans and the manager to worry about!

INCREASE YOUR WEALTH
Why not invest your hard-earned cash in a gym, restaurant or even buy a local footy team? After all, you can put that extra cash to good use!

LIVE THE LIFE
With success comes money and fame. Perhaps buy a Supercar or even a Yacht? Your lifestyle will make you more appealing to potential endorsement deals!

ARE YOU THE BEST?
Inevitability, as your reputation improves, bigger and better clubs will attempt to sign you. Do you stay loyal to your current club or move to pastures new? Do you move for money or sign for your favourite club?

Can you become the Football Superstar you know you can be?
Prove it…
